definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 将局部几何变换平移指定尺寸。

sentences.english: In this paper, a translation invariance wavelet transform is applied to image denoise.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要研究平移不变小波变换在图象降噪中的应用。

sentences.english: Bring up the TRANS INCR menu.
The combination of these two factors offers seamless panning of maps, Orr said.
sentences.chinese: 奥尔说，这两种要素的结合允许无缝的地图平移。

sentences.english: Translates the local geometric transformation by the specified dimensions in the specified order.
sentences.chinese: 按指定的顺序将局部几何变换平移指定的尺寸。

sentences.english: Approximation and recovery of band-limited functions from shift-invariant operators is studied.
sentences.chinese: 给出了有限频带函数利用平移不变算子的逼近与恢复。

sentences.english: The paper describes how hydraulic jacking and level-conveying shipment system for heavy and large cargo is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种重大件货物液压顶升与平移装船工作系统。

sentences.english: This paper introduces an algorithm for contour-parallel offset tool path linking without tool retractions.
sentences.chinese: 提出一个无跳刀的轮廓平移刀路轨迹优化算法。

sentences.english: Both of them were offset by large-sized sinistral move of the Tanlou fault in Mesozoic.
sentences.chinese: 郯庐断裂带中生代大规模左行平移使两者错开。

sentences.english: The translational hull of a semigroup plays an important role in the theory of ideal extensions of semigroups.
sentences.chinese: 半群平移壳在半群的理想扩张理论中占据重要地位。

sentences.english: The fault shows a left-lateral displacement at the active time.
sentences.chinese: 该断裂活跃时期主要表现为左行平移性质。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we designed a dual-stage suspension system that can only move translationally in a single plane.
sentences.chinese: 本论文设计了一个只有平移模态的双平台悬吊机构。

sentences.english: In this paper, some properties of translation and application for ball in normed linear space are given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了线性赋范空间中球的几个平移性质及其应用。

sentences.english: A sort of automatic control system of vertical elevator translation motion stereo-garage is designed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种垂直提升平移式立体车库的自动控制系统。

sentences.english: Panning and zooming are fundamental to the interactive map.
sentences.chinese: 平移和缩放是交互式地图的基本操作。

sentences.english: Synthetic slit rainbow holography is realized with translating the grating in this Paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出平移光栅法实现合成似狭缝彩虹全息术。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
to incline/to lean/to slant/to slope/to tilt
